full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,CHOS SKYONG RGYAL PO THAMS CAD LA GSOL KHA 'BUL TSUL BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004B (CES CHOS SKYONG RGYAL PO THAMS CAD LA GSOL KHA 'BUL BA'I RIM PA 'DI YANG, DGE BSGOS GNYIS DANG DGE 'DUN 'DUS PA'I TSOGS KYIS 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES GSUNG ZHING BSKUL BA LTAR, KHYI LA SENG GE'I MING BTAGS PA LTAR NO MONG ZHES 'BOD CING, MING GZHAN BLO TSUL KHRIMS MING CAN GYIS SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI BSTAN MA AER KHE PI LI THU'O, 'DI LTAR BGYIS PAS CHOS SKYONG CHEN POS NAM YANG MI 'BRAL BAR GROGS LA 'PHRIN LAS THAMS CAD THOGS MED 'GRUB PAR GYUR CIG ,MANGGA LAm, ,)
